attributes.action: Allow comments to be made on the petitions on the "http://petitions.pm.gov.uk" webpage
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There are a number of petitions on this website which are similar to others or are factually flawed. To enable comments on them would be to encourage a more reasonable discussion of each subject.

rejection.details: Feedback should be sent to team@petitions.pm.gov.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
